https://registrar.umd.edu/transfer-credi: Transfer Credit Services | Permission to Enroll If you wish to take a course at another institution and have that course and its credits transfer back to the University of Maryland, you are required to submit a Permission to Enroll (PTE) form with the College of your major. A copy of this form may be required at the visiting institution. Students should check with their advising College for policy related to permission to enroll in a course at another institution.| Select the appropriate College below to complete a PTE form: [A.
